publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1364 Nicola Sturgeon: Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell*
